descriptionHtml:
1st Mod

There are 2 beast race companions located in solitude near the fletcher and smithy.

Druuk-Nye the Argonian:Ranger - Good with bow , light armor and is stealthy.

Mu Jendoir the Khajiit:Barbarian - Good with two-handed , light armor and should be stealthy....

Enjoy this mod guys hope they help you out.

Feel free to use this mod in anyway you want and add show off some epic pictures with you and them in your guys adventures. ^_^

ENJOY!
author: Themdc
